OH MY GOD I DON'T HAVE A TV AND I WATCH BREAKING BAD AND I JUST LOOKED AT TWITTER ACCIDENTALLY
I don't want to exaggerate or anything, but sometimes software RUINS LIVES.
Really stoked to have a second to work on a new song, annnnnnnnnd Logic X is crashing every time it plays no matter what I do. Great.
Apparently making tumblr themes is only for masochists or savants.
Not sure if this is regression or evolution: going to work on a port of my sStory project as Tumblr theme.
Love @DaisyDisk: I just got rid of 32.1 GB . That's 8x as much as original iMac's hard disk! Thanks to @DaisyDisk http://t.co/Dycrjum9
I want to make something of myself and for some reason I can't stop surfing reddit.
@roopeshv I love my SSD (I have a 250gb in my MBP) but now I have a relatively small HD that's fast... external HD? SSD+Mac Mini? Not sure.
Trying to figure out what to do with my 128GB solid-state hard drive that I thought was such a good idea.
RT @PFailBlog: Attorney says,"If Santana shuts us out of the city council meeting, the meeting should be shut down by protest." #OO #O2
@mibi Why are you trying to get away from the term infographic?
Damn it. Googling for answers on journalism and I end up with a semi-related post I made on ask.metafilter - Too much internet in me.
I fell in love with delay and reverse and repetition, the sweet implication that the music's spinning.
Goodness gracious I'm selling my camera! http://hudsonvalley.craigslist.org/pho/1399858863.html
Working on Adrienne's website... installing Firebug and all that jazz. Been a while since I've done any web development!
I like to play a game called "how many friends of mine have I taken the picture they use as their default" and I am winning!
OH NO TWEETIE LOOK AT THAT YOU SUCK HELLO TWITTERRIFIC I ALREADY WANT TO TWEET MORE.
House S06E02: Worst cold open ever.
Talking to Nicole on the phone.
I love Eminem.
I want this bookshelf from Ikea. It's a lottttt of money, though. http://is.gd/3lxb
Just filled up a black contractor's bag with roomtrash. Still more to go. Oh...
Found my ring. And now I am wearing it.
GOING TO CONTINUE TO CLEAN MY ROOM NOW.
My stomach is really really unhappy.
@lotd "Holy calamity, scream insanity, all you ever gonna be's, another great fan of me" Holy Calamity by Handsome Boy Modeling School
I'm gonna go make... nachos...
Handsome Boy Modeling School discography (recently acquired) is making the night tonight. Jammin'!
Eating a delicious dinner... then doing homework and cleaning. Honest.
Watching Knocked Up, I should be doing homework or cleaning. This is a recurring twitter theme.
Apparently I've lost like 2 pounds in the last week. Uh... not sure that's healthy.
Gonna play some drums for a bit...
xkcd never ceases helping me figure out how to live my life.
Watching Ugly Betty. It's getting a little too soap-operay for me, and I'm not sure if the show mocking itself about it makes it alright.
Mobile Photo: Fusend Profile Page Mockup http://tinyurl.com/2ynewp
Reading an interesting little article claudio linked me on Freenode http://tinyurl.com/29jxpv
Annoyed- spent the past few days feeling like shit, I feel alright now and my dad wants me to mow the lawn and do a bunch of shit. Weekend?!
I'm feeling way better than I felt for the last few days... working on a new Fusend mockup and setting up to rewrite Fusend. Man...
Waking up... Listening to Xenocide, toast in hand. Mmm.
Going to sleep... I need a new bed. I'm starting to get sore in the neck region. >.<
I desire nothing more than a sharpie and a blank white wall and a stereo for my iPod. Please...
Demetri martin is the shit. Rebecca reminded me about him the other day.
Watching a video about legislators voting for others... I don't know what to think. http://tinyurl.com/2j6dk5
